Enumeration Type Documentation

enum fsdict::Global::CaseMode

Three modes are offered for case handling:

See also:
setCaseMode
Enumerator:
asIs 

don't change anything, take query as it comes

toLower 

change query to lower case and return all candidates lower case

restoreCase 

do search in lower case, but upcase first character of all cands if query was uppercase
